decision_conditions:
The applicant is informed that for the avoidance of doubt the details approved by this notice are as follows:-

-	PROPOSED SECOND FLOOR LAYOUT Submitted Drawing received by the Local Planning Authority on 30 Jun 2025
-	ACOUSTIC DETAILS (PLANNING CONDITION) Submitted Drawing received by the Local Planning Authority on 30 Jun 2025
-	SOUND INSULATION PERFORMANCE LETTER received by the Local Planning Authority on 30 Jun 2025
